title: Chicago Fire Season 13 Episode 20 Release Date, Time, Where to Watch
description: The Chicago Fire Season 13 Episode 20 release date and time are right around the corner, and viewers want to know the streaming details. In the previous episodes, Commissioner Grissom summons Boden to conduct a crucial task. He asks him to investigate and analyze a case concerning a burned house collapse, which also took the life […] The post Chicago Fire Season 13 Episode 20 Release Date, Time, Where to Watch appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Shazmeen Navrange
excerpt: Are you curious to know Chicago Fire Season 13 Episode 20 release date and time? Then, here's all you need to know.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: The Chicago Fire Season 13 Episode 20 release date and time are right around the corner, and viewers want to know the streaming details. In the previous episodes, Commissioner Grissom summons Boden to conduct a crucial task. He asks him to investigate and analyze a case concerning a burned house collapse, which also took the life of their very own firefighter. In episode 19, “Permanent Damage,” Kidd’s past resurfaced. Ten years ago, he responded to a burning house, and Severide investigates it now. Elsewhere, Carver and Violet search for a medic who went away without treating a victim. Novak, meanwhile, wants a new roommate. Here’s all you need to know about the upcoming episode. When is the Chicago Fire Season 13 Episode 20 release date & time? The episode’s release date is May 7, and its release time is 6 pm PT, 9 PM ET. Check out its release times in the U.S. below: TimezoneRelease DateRelease TimeEastern TimeMay 7, 202509:00 PMPacific TimeMay 7, 202506:00 PM Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in Chicago Fire Season 13. Where to watch Chicago Fire Season 13 Episode 20 You can watch Chicago Fire Season 13 Episode 20 via NBC and then the next day on Peacock. NBC is an American television network that offers a wide range of programs, including Brilliant Minds, Suits LA, and One Chicago Shows. On the other hand, Peacock is an over-the-top streaming service that offers a great collection of hits from NBCUniversal brands and third-party providers. As it doesn’t offer a free trial, users need to buy a plan to access its library. What is Chicago Fire Season 13 Episode 20 about? Chicago Fire is a procedural drama series that follows the firefighters who deal with risky situations to safeguard the city. Despite facing personal problems and challenges, they ensure to fulfill their life-threatening job with determination and bravery. The official synopsis for Chicago Fire is as follows: “An edge-of-your-seat view into the lives of everyday heroes committed to one of America’s noblest professions. For the firefighters, rescue squad and paramedics of Chicago Firehouse 51, no occupation is more stressful or dangerous, yet so rewarding and exhilarating. These courageous men and women are among the elite who forge headfirst into danger when everyone else is running the other way and whose actions make the difference between life and death.”
html:
The Chicago Fire Season 13 Episode 20 release date and time are right around the corner, and viewers want to know the streaming details.

In the previous episodes, Commissioner Grissom summons Boden to conduct a crucial task. He asks him to investigate and analyze a case concerning a burned house collapse, which also took the life of their very own firefighter. In episode 19, “Permanent Damage,” Kidd’s past resurfaced. Ten years ago, he responded to a burning house, and Severide investigates it now. Elsewhere, Carver and Violet search for a medic who went away without treating a victim. Novak, meanwhile, wants a new roommate.

Here’s all you need to know about the upcoming episode.

When is the Chicago Fire Season 13 Episode 20 release date & time?

The episode’s release date is May 7, and its release time is 6 pm PT, 9 PM ET.

Check out its release times in the U.S. below:

Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in Chicago Fire Season 13.

Where to watch Chicago Fire Season 13 Episode 20

You can watch Chicago Fire Season 13 Episode 20 via NBC and then the next day on Peacock.

NBC is an American television network that offers a wide range of programs, including Brilliant Minds, Suits LA, and One Chicago Shows.

On the other hand, Peacock is an over-the-top streaming service that offers a great collection of hits from NBCUniversal brands and third-party providers. As it doesn’t offer a free trial, users need to buy a plan to access its library.

What is Chicago Fire Season 13 Episode 20 about?

Chicago Fire is a procedural drama series that follows the firefighters who deal with risky situations to safeguard the city. Despite facing personal problems and challenges, they ensure to fulfill their life-threatening job with determination and bravery.

The official synopsis for Chicago Fire is as follows:

“An edge-of-your-seat view into the lives of everyday heroes committed to one of America’s noblest professions. For the firefighters, rescue squad and paramedics of Chicago Firehouse 51, no occupation is more stressful or dangerous, yet so rewarding and exhilarating. These courageous men and women are among the elite who forge headfirst into danger when everyone else is running the other way and whose actions make the difference between life and death.”
